sentences.en: As the number of cycles of reuse of water increases, salt balance becomes increasingly important.
sentences.cn: 盐均衡随着水的再利用循环次数的增加而日益变得重要.

sentences.en: Attention should be given to recovery and reuse of chemicals.
sentences.cn: 应当注意回收和回用化学品.

sentences.en: Chemical recovery and water reuse values obviously must offset these costs.
sentences.cn: 化学品的回收和水的回用价值明显地补偿了这些费用.

sentences.en: Copper, brass, and aluminium are separated and remelted for reuse.
sentences.cn: 铜、黄铜和铝被分门别类重新熔化以供再利用。

sentences.en: Domain analysis is most important work in software reuse.
sentences.cn: 领域分析是软件复用工程中最重要的工作.

sentences.en: Finally, good standards can lead to reduced maintenance costs and improved reuse of design and code.
sentences.cn: 最后, 好的标准能够降低维护费用,提高设计和代码的重复利用.

sentences.en: Look for ways to reuse existing objects rather than create new ones.
sentences.cn: 请设法重用当前存在的对象,而不是创建新对象.

sentences.en: No, inheritance is not the way to achieve code reuse!
sentences.cn: 打住! 继承的目的不是为了实现代码重用!

sentences.en: Quality control of color picture tubes may require the salvage and reuse of the glass envelopes.
sentences.cn: 彩色显像管的质量控制需要利用和回用玻璃泡废料.

sentences.en: So , component composition become the direction of software development and reuse.
sentences.cn: 构件组装成了软件开发和复用的必然趋势.

sentences.en: Software reuse is one of the available Methods: To solve these problems.
sentences.cn: 软件复用是缓和这些问题的最有效的方法之一.

sentences.en: The article includes two parts about recovery and reuse.
sentences.cn: 本文分成“回收资源”和“资源再用”两部分.

sentences.en: The bottles are designed to be reused up to 20 times.
sentences.cn: 这些瓶子最多可供重复使用20次。

sentences.en: The core of this article is component - based software reuse technique.
sentences.cn: 基于构件的软件复用技术的是本文讨论的核心内容.

sentences.en: Try where possible to reuse paper.
Wastewater reuse is an effective way to solve water shortage problem.
sentences.cn: 污水回用是解决城市缺水的一条有效途径.
